mdRecord.dcterms:title: Alderman Library
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Garnett Room in Alderman Library at the University of Virginia. Notation, "The Garnett Room which contains the private library of approximately two thousand volumes that belonged to Muscoe Russell Hunter Garnett of Elmwood in Essex County, VA, just as it was at the time of his death in 1864."
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
